post.summary: Register a Broker or Contractor via one-time link token
post.description:
Register a new Broker or Contractor using a one-time link token.

This endpoint requires different documents based on the user_type
stored in the OneTimeLink (Broker or Contractor).
For Broker:
- rera_cert, trade_license, bank_account, tax_registration (all required).
For Contractor:
- contract, trade_license, scope_of_work (all required).

An agreement PDF will be generated and returned in the response.

token.description: The OTL token from the link (determines user_type: Broker/Contractor)

password.description: User's password (min 6 chars), must match password_confirmation

rera_cert.description: Required if user_type is Broker (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

trade_license.description: Required if user_type is Broker or Contractor (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

bank_account.description: Required if user_type is Broker (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

tax_registration.description: Required if user_type is Broker (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

contract.description: Required if user_type is Contractor (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

scope_of_work.description: Required if user_type is Contractor (pdf, zip, jpg, jpeg, png)

201.description: User registered successfully, awaiting approval, agreement generated

agreement_url.description: URL to the generated agreement PDF

400.description: Invalid or already used token / Invalid user_type

422.description: Validation error (e.g., missing docs, password mismatch)

500.description: Server error while creating user or generating PDF

get.summary: Generate or retrieve a Reservation Form PDF for a booking
get.description:
Generate or retrieve an existing Reservation Form for a booking.

If a Reservation Form already exists, the existing record and its PDF URL are returned (HTTP 200).
Otherwise, a new PDF is generated, stored, and a new ReservationForm record is created (HTTP 201).

parameters.name: bookingId
parameters.description: ID of the booking for which the Reservation Form is generated

200.description: Reservation Form already exists, returning existing PDF URL

201.description: New Reservation Form created and returning new PDF URL

403.description: Forbidden (no permission to generate sales offer)

404.description: Booking not found or existing PDF file missing

422.description: Invalid booking/unit status or other validation error

post.summary: Upload a signed Reservation Form file
post.description:
Upload a signed Reservation Form (RF) file.

This endpoint accepts a PDF file for a specific ReservationForm record.
If the RF is no longer "Pending", only users with "CEO" or "System Maintenance" roles
can overwrite it. Otherwise, a 409 (Conflict) error is returned.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the ReservationForm to update

200.description: Signed RF uploaded and record updated

409.description: Conflict if the RF is already uploaded and user isn't CEO/System Maintenance

422.description: Validation error (e.g., file not a PDF)

post.summary: Approve a signed Reservation Form
post.description:
Approve a Reservation Form (RF).

This endpoint sets the Reservation Form status to "Approved" if it is currently "Signed".
It also updates the associated booking's status to "SPA Pending".

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the ReservationForm to approve

rf_url.description: Path or URL to the approved Reservation Form file

422.description: Cannot approve unless the form is Signed or other validation error
